TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TreeViewHitTestLocations extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines constants that represent areas of a or .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The TreeViewHitTestLocations enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo> class.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the TreeViewHitTestLocations enumeration. To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control named `treeView1`, and populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> with items. Ensure that `treeview1` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event for the form are associated with the `HandleMouseDown` method in this example.
[!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.t_0_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewPictureBoxWhidbeyMembers#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.t_0_1.cs)]
